ocr_results.text: government's numerous faceless internet police, this is almost like the re-staging of
the Maoist sida ("Four Big Rights") of the CR, that is, to speak out freely, to air views
freely, to hold great debates, and to write big-character posters in virtual space. In
some sense, it is not me who chose to take up the CR studies; it is the dire social and
economic reality in China today that has compelled me to pursue this project
